title: Winner announced of the “Help us rename ODMAT” competition

details.description: The Open Data Maturity Assessment Tool - affectionally known internally as ODMAT - is a new online tool that assesses the capability of an open data organisation and give recommendations for improvements. We wanted a name that better reflects the essence of this new tool, and we found it!
details.excerpt: It is finally time to announce the winner of the [Competition: help us rename ODMAT](https://theodi.org/blog/odmat-competition "Competition to rename ODMAT").
details.alternative_title: Winner announced of the “Help us rename ODMAT” competition
details.content:
It is finally time to announce the winner of the Competition: help us rename ODMAT.

The Open Data Maturity Assessment Tool - affectionally known internally as ODMAT - is a new online tool that assesses the capability of an open data organisation and give recommendations for improvements.

We wanted a name that better reflects the essence of this new tool, and we found it!

Congratulations to Charlie Carter, whose name submission was chosen by the panel of judges from the team behind the Open Data Maturity Project.

As the winner, Charlie not only gets the honour to name the tool, but also receives a £50 gift voucher.

Thank you to everyone who took part in the competition. And watch this space to find out what the winning name is when we launch the alpha version of the tool at the end of the month!

related.title: Public draft of the open data maturity model
